creditline: Gift of Roberta and Richard Simmons
description: man's shirt, cotton, dye, mud, (habu), wolo dye and mud, stripwoven African (Mali) stored in box; (Simmons); stored w/86.100.18,.20,.28,.31; open sides and sleeves, cloth imitates spotted coat of special cow; shirt worn for feast days and ceremonies
title: Man's Shirt (Woloru Nyawru)
